varbind.vbvalue: Invalid IUA ASP Traffic Handling Mode

event.descr:
The IUA session layer between the Media gateway and CCP has been configured with the wrong traffic handling mode. This parameter is not accessible to the operator and is usually the result of wrong SW versions.

varbind.vbvalue: PE Backup Persistent Data Is In Use

event.descr:
If for any reason the PE looses syncronization with the EMS that keeps the Routing data up-todate, the PE falls back to the last known good data. This can also be the case when the PE's "Block Dynamic Provisioning" flag is set to "Yes"

varbind.vbvalue: Database Table Segment High Threshold Exceeded

event.descr:
The Oracle database on the EMS/CDR uses a temporary buffer to process data and the alarm indicates that the buffer size has expanded more than the higher limit. This usually needs re-adjust of the buffer by Database adminstrator.
